TopicTitle: Billion Pixel View of Mars - Curiosity

Articles.Content:
Hi,

If this has been posted before my apologies. Or if it is in the wrong place, please move it.

Anyway, if you haven't seen this amazing panorama of Mars, you owe it to yourself. The detail is incredible.

http://mars.nasa.gov/multimedia/interactives/billionpixel/index.cfm?image=PIA16918&view=pano

Fly Straight and True
I understand the view is many patched together photos but does anyone know why the section with the rover body is black and white?
Because they had to use photos from multiple cameras and some were in black and white.
Clicked the things about the green and white things, I wonder whether the conspiracy theorists are going to believe the camera markings story...
